name: NUVAVULT
description:
NUVAVULT is a perspective altering puzzle game where 2D and 3D collide. What intially appears to be a classic 2D platformer soon transforms into something much... deeper.

You progress through several zones, each introducing a new way to alter and interact with the world.

The 70+ puzzles are designed to reveal how the world works, without the need for explanation.

The world is not as flat as it first appears.
